channel.title: CVE Feed for ThemeLocation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ThemeLocation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-46629|2024-08-29T13:29:16.488Z -- themelocation -- remove%20add%20to%20cart%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in themelocation Remove Add to Cart WooCommerce plugin <=Â 1.4.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-43271|2024-08-19T17:41:37.934Z -- themelocation -- woo%20products%20widgets%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Themelocation Woo Products Widgets For Elementor allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Woo Products Widgets For Elementor: from n/a through 2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-33956|2024-08-02T02:42:59.892Z -- themelocation -- custom%20woocommerce%20checkout%20fields%20editor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThemeLocation Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor.This issue affects Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-1697|2024-08-01T18:48:21.674Z -- themelocation -- custom%20woocommerce%20checkout%20fields%20editor
item.description: The Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the save_wcfe_options function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-30518|2024-06-04T17:38:56.774Z -- themelocation -- custom%20woocommerce%20checkout%20fields%20editor
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ThemeLocation Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor.This issue affects Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-33956|2024-06-04T17:45:18.011Z -- themelocation -- custom%20woocommerce%20checkout%20fields%20editor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThemeLocation Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor.This issue affects Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-1697|2024-06-04T18:00:40.517Z -- themelocation -- custom%20woocommerce%20checkout%20fields%20editor
item.description: The Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the save_wcfe_options function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ThemeLocation Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor.This issue affects Custom WooCommerce Checkout Fields Editor: from n/a through 1.3.0.
